name: black-highlighter
description: Modern base theme for the SCP Wiki (build process)

scripts.watch: postcss --config build/postcss.config.js src/css/black-highlighter.css -o dist/css/black-highlighter.css --watch | postcss --config buildpostcss.config.js src/css/normalize.css -o dist/css/normalize.css --watch

browserslist: Chrome >= 58,  ChromeAndroid >= 58,  Android >= 58,  Firefox >= 54,  FirefoxAndroid >= 54, Safari >= 10.1,  iOS >= 10.3,  Opera >= 44,  OperaMobile >= 59,  UCAndroid >= 12.12,  Samsung >= 6.2,  QQAndroid >= 10.4,  Kaios >= 2.5, Edge >= 16
